name: Slope from wish
description:
Description

This is my first finished unity game, and it's up to the stereotypical unity game standards. It's a slightly upgraded version of Brackeys' game, with no self-made assets.  I know that there are better games out there with more effort that deserve your attention, but hey, this is pretty fun though. I guess.

How to open

  1. Download the game
  2. Right click the file named "tescos_slope.zip"
  3. Press "extract" Or Open the file, press "tescos_slope.exe" And do whatever windows tells you (it will extract it for you)
  4. Press "tescos_slope.exe"
  5. Windows will try to warn you that it's a bad game
  6. Press "more optissions"
  7. Press "run anyway"
  8. Have no fun at all
  9. Press quit
  10. Play a better game

How to play

  • Start game with space
  • Pause game with ESC
  • Arrows and WASD moves you left and right
  • Boost with Up or W
  • Use the slope at the edge of the platform to jump
  • Your Boost Meter fills up, when you boost or get close to enemies
  • When it's full, you can ram through the enemies
